activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.ViewPagerActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: holds dynamic fragment content related to the current medium being viewed.
allows users to swipe through media items or programmatically move between them.
triggers actions like play/pause slideshow, favorite toggle, or hiding/unhiding media.
provides a visual shadow at the top of the screen to separate toolbar from content.

activities.summary: This activity, ViewPagerActivity, is used for viewing media files (images/videos) in a paginated view. It supports functionalities such as navigating between media items, editing, sharing, rotating, slideshow playback, and handling configuration changes like screen orientation. It also manages permissions, UI states, and interactions with other components or activities.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.HiddenFoldersActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Hosts the toolbar, RecyclerView, and placeholder TextView for managing hidden folders.
Triggers the addFolder method to open a folder selection dialog for adding new hidden folders.
Holds the RecyclerView and placeholder TextView to display the list of hidden folders.
Shows the list of hidden folders using a RecyclerView adapter for dynamic updates.

static_properties.text: Excluding folders will make them together with their subfolders hidden just in Simple Gallery, they will still be visible in other applications.\n\nIf you want to hide them from other apps too, use the Hide function.

dynamic_properties.effect: Informs the user about the behavior of hidden folders and their visibility in other applications.

activities.summary: This activity, HiddenFoldersActivity, is used to manage hidden folders in the gallery application. It allows users to add folders that should be hidden from view within the app, displays the list of currently hidden folders, and provides options to refresh or update this list.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.SettingsActivity

activities.summary: This activity is used for application settings configuration, allowing users to customize various aspects of the app including general settings, media playback, thumbnails, scrolling behavior, fullscreen media options, deep zooming images, extended details, security, file operations, bottom actions, recycle bin management, and data import/export.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.VideoPlayerActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Holds the main video player interface and all related UI elements.
Provides gesture support for zooming or interacting with the video surface.
Displays the actual video content using a TextureView.
Allows volume adjustment through swipe gestures on the right side of the screen.
Enables brightness adjustment via swipe gestures on the left side of the screen.
Adds shadow effect at the top to visually separate the AppBar from the video surface.
Displays gradient overlay at the bottom to improve readability of time controls above it.
Includes the layout containing playback time controls (SeekBar, current/duration text).
Shows additional info during slide gestures; hidden by default with zero alpha.
Holds the toolbar and navigation icon at the top of the activity.
Displays action items like menu and back navigation; allows configuration changes like screen rotation.
Container for video playback time controls including SeekBar and time TextViews.
Navigates to the previous video in the playlist.
Toggles between play and pause states of the video playback.
Navigates to the next video in the playlist.
Shows the current playback position of the video.
Allows user to drag and jump to different positions in the video timeline.
Shows the total duration of the currently playing video.

activities.summary: The VideoPlayerActivity is responsible for video playback functionality, including controls like play/pause, seek, fast-forward/rewind, fullscreen toggle, orientation lock, and handling touch/gesture interactions. It uses ExoPlayer for media playback, supports saving/resuming video progress, and manages UI components such as SeekBar, time labels, toolbar, and system UI visibility.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.SetWallpaperActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Provides structure for child views with Material Design behavior.
Holds the app bar (toolbar) of the activity.
Displays options like confirming wallpaper or changing aspect ratio.
Holds main content such as the CropImageView.
Allows user to crop selected image based on defined aspect ratio.
Changes the aspect ratio mode of the CropImageView cyclically (portrait, landscape, square).
Rotates the displayed image by 90 degrees in the CropImageView.

activities.summary: This activity is used for setting a wallpaper image, including selecting an image, cropping it based on aspect ratio, and applying it as the device wallpaper.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.PanoramaPhotoActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: holds the panoramic view component and other overlay elements
renders 360-degree panoramic images; initially hidden until loaded
provides visual contrast at the bottom of the screen for improved button visibility
likely triggers cardboard or VR mode toggle for the panorama viewer
toggles exploration mode (enables interactive viewing of the panorama)

activities.summary: This activity is used to display panoramic images in a VR-compatible view (VrPanoramaView). It handles image loading from Intents, supports fullscreen mode toggling, immersive UI behavior, and adjusts UI layout based on device configuration changes. The activity also manages rendering lifecycle events and ensures memory-safe decoding of large bitmaps.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.SearchActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Hosts other UI components like the search menu, RecyclerView, and fastscroller with coordinated behavior.
Allows user to enter search text and navigate back. Handles text change events for real-time filtering and back press logic.
Holds the RecyclerView that displays filtered media items and handles scroll behavior integration with the AppBar.

static_properties.text: No media files have been found with the selected filters.

dynamic_properties.effect: Shows a placeholder message when no media matches the current search filters; visibility toggles dynamically based on results.
Provides fast scrolling functionality for navigating through the list or grid of media items efficiently.
Displays media items (images/videos) in a grid layout, allowing user interaction like clicking to view or delete items.

static_properties.text: No media files have been found with the selected filters.

activities.summary: The SearchActivity is designed to allow users to search and manage media files (images/videos) within the app. It supports viewing media in grid or list format, filtering based on search input, and performing actions such as deleting files either by moving them to the Recycle Bin or permanently removing them. The activity manages asynchronous loading of media items, updates the UI accordingly, and allows toggling filename visibility.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.PhotoVideoActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Wraps all bottom action buttons and aligns them at the bottom of the screen for easy access.
Toggles favorite status for the currently displayed media item.
Opens the edit functionality for the current media file (photo or video).
Shares the currently displayed media via an intent with other apps.
Deletes the selected media file after user confirmation.
Rotates the currently displayed photo by 90 degrees clockwise.
Displays metadata or properties of the media file in a dialog.
Changes the display orientation of the media viewer (e.g., portrait to landscape).
Starts a slideshow of the current media collection if applicable.
Displays the location where the media was captured on a map, if GPS data is available.
Toggles visibility of hidden media files based on user preference.
Renames the currently selected media file after user input.
Sets the current media as wallpaper or profile picture depending on app context.
Copies the selected media file to another folder chosen by the user.
Moves the current media file to a different folder selected by the user.
Resizes the current image file according to user-defined dimensions.
Hosts either a PhotoFragment or VideoFragment for displaying the current media.

activities.summary: The PhotoVideoActivity is responsible for displaying and managing media files such as photos and videos. It supports functionalities like fullscreen toggling, navigation between media items, video playback, slideshow, editing, sharing, and handling file visibility. It initializes UI components based on the intent data and handles device configuration changes to ensure a consistent user interface.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.IncludedFoldersActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Serves as the root layout for the activity, providing structure and coordination for child views including the toolbar, RecyclerView, and placeholder text.
Displays the toolbar with an options menu that includes the 'add_folder' functionality when clicked.
Holds the RecyclerView and TextView elements, organizing the visual components of the folder management UI.
A custom RecyclerView that lists all included folders and dynamically updates when folders are added or removed.

static_properties.text: Excluding folders will make them together with their subfolders hidden just in Simple Gallery, they will still be visible in other applications.\n\nIf you want to hide them from other apps too, use the Hide function.

dynamic_properties.effect: Shows descriptive text explaining how excluded folders behave in the app when there are no folders to display, otherwise hidden.

activities.summary: This activity, IncludedFoldersActivity, is used to manage a list of included folders in the gallery application. It allows users to add folders via a dialog, displays them in a RecyclerView, and updates the UI accordingly. The activity integrates with toolbar options and manages placeholder visibility based on folder data.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.SimpleActivity
activities.summary: The SimpleActivity serves as a base activity for handling common functionalities across the application, such as managing themes, permissions, and configurations.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.WidgetConfigureActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: acts as the main layout container for the widget UI components such as background, image, and folder name.
renders the selected background color with optional transparency as configured by the user.
shows the folder thumbnail image retrieved from the database for the selected folder.
shows the folder name if enabled via settings; positioned at the bottom of the widget for clarity.

activities.summary: This activity, WidgetConfigureActivity, is used for configuring the appearance and behavior of a widget. It allows users to select a folder, customize background and text colors, adjust transparency, and control whether the folder name is displayed on the widget.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.MediaActivity

static_properties.text: No media files have been found with the selected filters.
No media files have been found with the selected filters.

activities.summary: The MediaActivity is the core activity for displaying and managing media (images/videos) in a gallery application. It supports various UI configurations such as grid/list view, column count adjustment, sorting, filtering, and grouping of media items. The activity provides functionalities like viewing media, selecting files, deleting or moving to Recycle Bin, setting wallpapers, creating folders, and managing hidden files. It also handles asynchronous loading of media, UI state management, and interacts with RecyclerView, FastScroller, and pull-to-refresh components for an optimized browsing experience.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.VideoActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for handling video-related operations, as indicated by setting the `mIsVideo` flag to true in the onCreate method. However, no additional logic or UI interactions are provided in the given code snippet.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.PhotoActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used to display a photo, initializing the activity and setting up related variables, such as marking mIsVideo as false.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.EditActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: toggles between activating and deactivating filter mode, updating UI elements accordingly.
toggles between activating and deactivating crop/rotate mode, updating UI elements accordingly.
toggles between activating and deactivating drawing mode, updating UI elements accordingly.
shows the original image loaded from a URI without any edits applied.
shows an image inside a cropping interface that allows transformations like rotation and aspect ratio adjustments.
renders a canvas where users can draw over the image using customizable tools.
adjusts the brush size for drawing on the canvas based on the progress value.
opens a color picker dialog to change the current drawing color.
reverts the last drawing action made on the canvas.
rotates the currently displayed image in the CropImageView.
adjusts the size of the cropping window or the image itself depending on the current configuration.
changes the aspect ratio for cropping and updates the UI to highlight the selected option.
flips the image horizontally within the CropImageView.
flips the image vertically within the CropImageView.

activities.summary: The EditActivity is used for editing images through various functionalities such as applying filters, cropping, rotating, resizing, and drawing. It allows users to modify images directly within the app or with third-party editors, and supports saving or sharing edited images while preserving metadata.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.MainActivity

static_properties.text: Switch to file search across all visible folders
No media files have been found with the selected filters.
Switch to file search across all visible folders
No media files have been found with the selected filters.

activities.summary: The MainActivity serves as the main interface for browsing and managing media directories. It supports grid/list view types, column count adjustments, folder creation, filtering, sorting, and handling of special folders like Recycle Bin and Favorites. It also manages user interactions, permissions, and lifecycle events, while integrating with other components like MediaActivity for detailed media viewing.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The SplashActivity serves as a launch screen for the application, performing necessary initialization tasks such as checking and migrating user favorites before transitioning to the MainActivity.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.ExcludedFoldersActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Serves as the root layout container for the activity, providing structure and coordination for other UI components.
Displays the toolbar with title and menu items, specifically the 'add_folder' menu item which allows adding new excluded folders.
Holds child views such as the RecyclerView for displaying the list of excluded folders.
Displays the list of excluded folders using a custom RecyclerView with a LinearLayoutManager.

static_properties.text: Excluding folders will make them together with their subfolders hidden just in Simple Gallery, they will still be visible in other applications.\n\nIf you want to hide them from other apps too, use the Hide function.

dynamic_properties.effect: Shows placeholder text explaining the functionality of excluding folders when the list is empty.

activities.summary: The ExcludedFoldersActivity allows users to manage a list of folders that should be excluded (hidden) from the gallery app. Users can add new folders to this exclusion list via a folder picker dialog, and the activity dynamically updates and displays the list of excluded folders using a RecyclerView.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.gallery.pro.activities.PanoramaVideoActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: holds the VR video view and related UI components for panoramic video display.
renders the panoramic VR video content and allows user interaction for VR mode and exploration.
includes the layout for bottom video control elements like current time, seekbar, duration, and play/pause button.
toggles between normal and explore mode in VR video view for manual panning and viewing direction adjustment.
toggles cardboard VR mode on/off to enable stereoscopic VR viewing experience.
holds the video playback time indicator, seekbar, and control buttons at the bottom of the screen.
skips to the previous video file in the playlist or gallery.
toggles between play and pause states of the currently playing VR video.
skips to the next video file in the playlist or gallery.
shows the current playback time of the video in MM:SS format.
allows the user to scrub through the video by dragging the seekbar to a new position.
shows the total duration of the video in MM:SS format.

activities.summary: The `PanoramaVideoActivity` is responsible for playing panoramic VR videos. It handles video playback controls such as play, pause, seek, skip forward/backward, fullscreen toggle, and manages the UI accordingly. It also supports device configuration changes (like orientation) and ensures proper lifecycle management of video rendering and resource cleanup.
